inputs.name: allow_insecure
inputs.description: Sets the allow_insecure setting in the transport_config section of the daos_*.yml files

inputs.name: daos_crt_timeout
inputs.description: crt_timeout

inputs.name: daos_disk_count
inputs.description: Number of local ssd's to use

inputs.name: daos_disk_type
inputs.description: Daos disk type to use. For now only suported one is local-ssd

inputs.name: daos_scm_size
inputs.description: scm_size

inputs.name: gvnic
inputs.description: Use Google Virtual NIC (gVNIC) network interface

inputs.name: instance_base_name
inputs.description: MIG instance base names to use

inputs.name: labels
inputs.description: Set of key/value label pairs to assign to daos-server instances

inputs.name: machine_type
inputs.description: GCP machine type. ie. e2-medium

inputs.name: mig_name
inputs.description: MIG name

inputs.name: network_name
inputs.description: Name of the GCP network to use

inputs.name: number_of_instances
inputs.description: Number of daos servers to bring up

inputs.name: os_disk_size_gb
inputs.description: OS disk size in GB

inputs.name: os_disk_type
inputs.description: OS disk type ie. pd-ssd, pd-standard

inputs.name: os_family
inputs.description: OS GCP image family

inputs.name: os_project
inputs.description: OS GCP image project name. Defaults to project_id if null.

inputs.name: pools
inputs.description: If provided, this module will generate a script to create a list of pools. pool attributes have to be specified in a format acceptable by [dmg](https://docs.daos.io/v2.0/admin/pool_operations/) and daos.

inputs.name: preemptible
inputs.description: If preemptible instances

inputs.name: project_id
inputs.description: The GCP project to use

inputs.name: region
inputs.description: The GCP region to create and test resources in

inputs.name: service_account
inputs.description: Service account to attach to the instance. See https://www.terraform.io/docs/providers/google/r/compute_instance_template.html#service_account.

inputs.name: ssh_user
inputs.description: Sets user used to SSH, so that it could sets proper permissions on files

inputs.name: subnetwork_name
inputs.description: Name of the GCP sub-network to use

inputs.name: subnetwork_project
inputs.description: The GCP project where the subnetwork is defined

inputs.name: template_name
inputs.description: MIG template name

inputs.name: zone
inputs.description: The GCP zone to create and test resources in

outputs.name: access_points
outputs.description: List of DAOS servers to use as access points

outputs.name: daos_agent_yml
outputs.description: YAML to configure the daos agent. This is typically saved in /etc/daos/daos_agent.yml

outputs.name: daos_ca_secret_id
outputs.description: ID of Secret Manager secret used to store daosCA.tar.gz file generated on first DAOS server instance

outputs.name: daos_client_install_script
outputs.description: Script to install the DAOS client package.

outputs.name: daos_config_script
outputs.description: Script to configure the DAOS system. This will format the sytem with dmg -l and optionally create the specified pools.

outputs.name: daos_control_yml
outputs.description: YAML configuring DAOS control. This is typically saved in /etc/daos/daos_control.yml
